title: Maxi-Matic Elite Cuisine ECM-2919 Flip Bundt Cake Maker, Black
features: Makes 6.5-inch Bundt cakes faster than the over
Rotates to create even baked Bundt cake
Non-stick cooking surface for hassle free clean up
description: The Elite ECM-2919 Cuisine Flip Bundt Cake Maker, Black makes perfectly shaped Bundt cakes. The non-stick baking plates are easy to clean, and the removable cake tray allows you to quickly and easily cool and serve cake. The unique design flips upside down to bake evenly and is faster than cooking in an oven. It makes 6.5-inch Bundt cakes. There are separate power and ready indicator lights to let you know when to add the batter. The folding handle creates easy and compact storage. The Elite Cuisine Flip Bundt Cake Maker is a fun activity for the whole family!
categories: Electric Cake Pop & Mini Cake Makers
